amendment.description: To withhold 20 percent of the Federal funding appropriated for the Global Fund until the Secretary certifies that the Global Fund has provided the State Department with access to financial and other data.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5086 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 5086 proposed by Senator Biden for Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S6828-6829; text: CR S6828) To withhold 20 percent of the Federal funding appropriated for the Global Fund until the Secretary certifies that the Global Fund has provided the State Department with access to financial and other data.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5086 proposed by Senator Biden for Senator Vitter.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5086 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
